data.text: Ahero Jehova Nyasaye nikech nowinjo kwayona;
Tonde mag tho norida, lit mar liel nochopona,
Eka naluongo nying Jehova Nyasaye, ne aywakne niya,
Jehova Nyasaye ngʼwon kendo timo maber;
Jehova Nyasaye rito joma chunygi obolore;
Nimar in ema isegolo chunya e tho, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
isetimo kamano mondo awuothi e nyim Jehova Nyasaye,
Ne ayie; emomiyo ne awacho niya,
Abiro tingʼo okumba mar warruok malo
Abiro chopo singruokga ma asetimo ne Jehova Nyasaye
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, an jatichni adier;
abiro chopogi e lache mag od Jehova Nyasaye
